game.beginning: As a young child, I recall the first time I noticed the dark spots that surrounded Earth, I was amazed at the beautiful star clouds, bright suns, and planets that could be seen with the naked eye, they were like jewels that shuffled through the night's sky.
game.ending: I have grown used to a life away from Earth, I am glad to say that our species as a whole is doing well.
game.synopsis: We now travel in large ships known as spaceships.  They have given us this freedom, taken us to other star systems.
game.title: Our civilization has become intergalactic
